about_the_app_description: It is a logistics management platform that connects shippers, agents, truck owners, and drivers in one unified system. It helps streamline shipment creation, service allocation, tracking, and delivery ‚Äî ensuring faster communication and efficient transport management.

backgroundLocationPermissionExplanation:
To track your location when the app is closed, please upgrade the permission to 'Allow all the time'.

1. Tap 'Go to Settings'.
2. Tap 'Permissions', then 'Location'.
3. Select 'Allow all the time'.

Afterward, please return to the app and tap the tracking switch again.

section101Body: Terms may be updated. Continued use means acceptance.
section10Paragraph:
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

Company Name: TRUCK SINGH
Email: trucksingh.com@gmail.com
section1Body: Welcome to Truck Singh, a unified logistics platform connecting Shippers, Agents, Truck Owners and Drivers. By accessing or using this App, you agree to these Terms. If you disagree, please stop using the App.
section1Paragraph1: Welcome to TRUCK SINGH. We provide a logistics platform that connects Shippers, Agents, Drivers, and Truck Owners (collectively, "Users") to facilitate the booking, tracking, and management of freight shipments.
section1Paragraph2: This Privacy Policy explains what personal information we collect from our Users, how we use and share that information, and your rights in connection with our services.
section1Paragraph3: By creating an account or using our Services, you agree to the collection, use, and sharing of your information as described in this policy.
section2Body: You must provide accurate information and maintain account confidentiality. Fraud, fake identity, unauthorized activity, or illegal conduct will result in account suspension/termination and possible legal action.
section2Paragraph1: We collect information to provide and improve our Services. The type of information we collect depends on your role as a User.
section2SubA: A. Information You Provide Directly (All Users)
section2SubAParagraph:
Account Information: When you register, you provide your name, email address, phone number, a password, and your designated role (e.g., Shipper, Driver).

Profile Information: You may add further details to your profile, such as a profile picture or company name.

Communications: We collect information when you contact us for support, report an issue, or otherwise communicate with us.
section2SubB: B. Information Collected Based on Your Role
section2SubBParagraph1: We collect specific information necessary for each role to use the Services:
section2SubBParagraph2:
If you are a Shipper:

Company Details: Your company name, business address, and GSTIN (or other tax identification numbers).

Shipment Details: Information about your shipments, including pickup and drop-off locations, recipient names and phone numbers, and descriptions of the goods being transported.
section2SubBParagraph3:
If you are an Agent:

Agency/Company Details: Your company name, business address, and GSTIN.

Financial Information: Bank account details for processing payments and commissions.

Client Information: You may enter information on behalf of Shippers, which includes their shipment and company details as listed above.
section2SubBParagraph4:
If you are a Truck Owner:

Business Details: Your company or business name, address, and GSTIN.

Financial Information: Bank account details for receiving payments.

Vehicle Information: Detailed information about your trucks, including truck registration numbers, vehicle type, insurance documents, permits, and vehicle-specific details like engine and chassis numbers.
section2SubBParagraph5:
If you are a Driver:

Identity Verification: Your driver's license number and/or photo, and potentially other government-issued ID to verify your identity and eligibility to drive.

Vehicle Information: The truck number and type you are associated with (if not the Truck Owner).
section2SubCParagraph:
Precise Location Data (Drivers): This is essential for our Service. We collect your precise geolocation from your mobile device only when you are on an active, assigned shipment. This tracking occurs even when the app is in the background. This data is used to:

Show Shippers and Agents the live location of their shipment.

Calculate ETAs (Estimated Times of Arrival).

Verify shipment milestones (e.g., "Arrived at Pickup").

(If you have an SOS feature) Share your location with your company or emergency services.

Usage Information: We log activity on our Services, including features you use, pages you view, and dates/times of your sessions.

Device Information: We collect data about your mobile device, such as the hardware model, operating system, and unique device identifiers.

Cookies and Similar Technologies: We may use cookies to store user preferences and session information.
section3Paragraph:
We use your information for the following purposes:

To Provide and Manage the Services: To create your account, connect Shippers with Drivers/Truck Owners, generate Bilty/shipping documents, process payments, and track active shipments.

To Ensure Safety and Security: To verify driver identities, prevent fraud, and (if applicable) operate safety features like an SOS button.

To Communicate with You: To send you service-related notifications (e.g., "New Shipment Assigned"), invoices, and support messages.

For Customer Support: To investigate and resolve your issues or inquiries.

To Comply with Legal Obligations: To meet legal and regulatory requirements, such as tax laws (which require GSTIN and bank details) and transportation regulations.

To Improve Our Services: To analyze how our Users interact with the app so we can improve its functionality and user experience.
section3_1Body:
As a Driver:
- You confirm you hold required licences, registration and insurance
- Follow safe driving standards & transport laws
- Maintain vehicle fitness & route compliance
- Accept assignments responsibly
- Do not solicit payment outside the App
- Do not tamper with tracking or avoid jobs without reason

The Platform is not liable for loss, damage or delay caused by your conduct, vehicle condition or handling of goods.
section3_2Body:
As an Agent:
- Coordinate Shippers, Truck Owners & Drivers
- Create shipments, allocate vehicles & monitor trips
- Ensure documents, vehicle & driver validity
- Do not misrepresent load capacity, route, cost or documents
- Do not bypass app workflow for external deals

The Platform is not responsible for disputes or deals done outside the App.
section3_3Body:
As a Truck Owner:
- Provide legally compliant vehicles & eligible drivers
- Keep fleet details updated
- Do not accept jobs you cannot fulfil
- Manage routing, tracking, loading/unloading

The Platform is not liable for damage, delay, breakdowns or regulatory issues.
section3_4Body:
As a Shipper:
- Provide correct shipment details (goods, weight, pickup, delivery)
- Maintain valid identity & business details
- Do not bypass platform workflow to avoid fees
- Pay quoted price, fees & taxes
- Update shipment details if changed

The Platform only facilitates connections and is not liable for damages, loss, or delays. Claims must be pursued with the assigned Agent/Truck Owner/Driver.
section41Body:
You must not:
- Submit false documents or load/vehicle info
- Circumvent platform or fees
- Harass or abuse other users
- Hack, manipulate or misuse app systems
section4Paragraph:
Your information is shared only as necessary to provide the Services.

Between Users (To Fulfill a Shipment):

Shippers and Agents will see: The assigned Driver's name, truck number, and the live location of the driver during the active shipment.

Drivers and Truck Owners will see: The Shipper/Recipient name, company, phone number, and the pickup/drop-off addresses for the shipment.

Payment Processors: To securely handle payments.

For Legal Reasons: We may share information with law enforcement or government authorities if required by law, in response to a court order, or to protect the rights, property, or safety of our Users or the public.

Business Transfers: If we are involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
section51Body: Payments are between users. Truck Singh is not responsible for disputes or losses due to incorrect banking details, delays or offline agreements.
section5Paragraph: We implement reasonable technical and administrative security measures to protect your information from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access. This includes encryption and access controls. However, no system is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information.
section61Body: The app uses GPS for assignment matching, live tracking and safety. By using the app, you consent to location access.
section6Paragraph:
We retain your personal information for as long as you have an active account with us.

After you close your account, we may retain your information for a longer period as necessary to:

Comply with legal obligations (e.g., tax and financial records).

Resolve disputes or enforce our agreements.

Maintain fraud and abuse prevention records.
section71Body: We collect and use data to improve service and safety. Please review our Privacy Policy for details.
section7Paragraph:
You have choices regarding your personal information:

Account Information: You can access and update your profile information (name, phone, bank details, etc.) at any time through the "Settings" or "Profile" section of the app.

Location Data (Drivers): You can disable the app's access to your location through your device's settings. However, doing so will prevent you from being assigned or completing shipments, as live tracking is a core part of the Service.

Account Deletion: You can request to delete your account by contacting us. We may be unable to delete your account if you have an active shipment or if we are required to retain your information for legal reasons (as noted in Section 6).

Disabling Account: You may have an option to "Disable" your account in the app settings. This will temporarily deactivate your account, but your data will not be deleted.
section81Body: Accounts violating policies or laws may be suspended or permanently terminated.
section8Paragraph: Our Services are not intended for or directed at individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
section91Body:
Truck Singh is a technology platform only. We are not responsible for:
- Shipment loss/damage
- Driver or owner behavior
- Payment disputes
- Delays or operational issues
section9Paragraph: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make significant changes, we will notify you through the app or by email. Your continued use of the Services after a change becomes effective constitutes your acceptance of the new policy.
shipmentNotificationsDescription: Stay updated on your shipment progress in real-time. You will receive alerts when a shipment is created, picked up, loading, dispatched, dropped, unloading, delayed, or successfully delivered. These notifications help you monitor logistics and ensure timely operations.

terms_text:
1. The trader should load the goods only after completing all the vehicle documents.
2. Insurance of goods more than Rs. 10,000/- is a must.
3. Goods will be transported at owner's risk.
4. Payment should be made as per agreed terms.
5. Any dispute will be subject to local jurisdiction.
6. E-way bill compliance is mandatory for GST registered businesses.
7. Delivery will be made only to the authorized person.
8. Detention charges will be applicable for delays beyond control.
